panel.name: panel_performance_huds
panel.text: Detaching HUDs you aren't using saves memory and can make the viewer run faster.
HUDs are often heavily scripted and also contribute to server-side lag.
Note: Using a HUD's minimize button does not detach it. Use the X to remove it.

name_list.columns.label: Time (Î¼s)
name_list.columns.name: art_value
name_list.columns.tool_tip: Time taken to render this HUD (microseconds)
